pullRequest.title: implement fix for hp-ux version parsing
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
Fixes #1474
Add an extra runtime property elastic.apm.disable_bootstrap_checks that allows to bypass JVM version check when it's value is set to true.
Checklist

 This is a bugfix

 I have updated CHANGELOG.asciidoc
 I have added tests that would fail without this fix
 I have updated supported JVM version docs
 I have documented the elastic.apm.disable_bootstrap_checks flag

commit.message: implement fix for hp-ux version parsing

Update apm-agent-core/src/main/java/co/elastic/apm/agent/bci/AgentMain.java

add self-documenting error message

Co-authored-by: eyalkoren <41850454+eyalkoren@users.noreply.github.com>
add hp-ux entry in supported JVM list
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elastic/apm-agent-java into fix-hpux-version-parsing
